import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState}from'react';import Terminal from'./Terminal';import'./LandingPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LandingPage=()=>{const backgroundRef=useRef(null);const fadeRef=useRef(null);const[showTerminal,setShowTerminal]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const scrollTop=window.pageYOffset||document.documentElement.scrollTop;// Apply zoom effect based on scroll position
